characteristics.name: Focus
characteristics.description: The user consistently focuses on specific topics in their content, demonstrating a clear direction and expertise.

characteristics.name: Tone
characteristics.description: The user maintains a consistent tone in their content, often using humor or sarcasm to engage with their audience.

options.description: Uses irony and ridicule to make points.

characteristics.name: Engagement
characteristics.description: The user actively engages with their audience, responding to comments and creating a sense of community.

options.description: Responds promptly to comments and messages.
Responds only to particularly relevant or interesting comments.

characteristics.name: Depth
characteristics.description: The user explores complex topics in depth, demonstrating a high level of expertise and nuance.

options.description: Provides more detailed analysis and insights.

characteristics.name: Storytelling
characteristics.description: The user uses narrative techniques to convey information, making complex topics more accessible and engaging.

options.description: Presents information in a straightforward, factual manner.

characteristics.name: Humor
characteristics.description: The user incorporates humor into their content, often using it to break the ice or make points.

options.description: Uses clever wordplay and satire to engage with topics.
Uses understatement and deadpan delivery to convey humor.

characteristics.name: Humility
characteristics.description: The user demonstrates humility in their content, acknowledging the limitations of their knowledge and expertise.

options.description: Becomes dismissive or confrontational when questioned.

characteristics.name: Empathy
characteristics.description: The user shows empathy in their content, actively trying to understand and relate to the perspectives of others.

options.description: Demonstrates genuine concern for the well-being of others.
Treats topics as purely analytical, without emotional consideration.
